Author: invincibletitan33
Text: Are you able to speak to a therapist or counsellor in the mean time? Or idk what country you're in, but are there other resources or helplines? The first step to getting better is reaching out for help. I'm sorry that it feels like no one is listening. Keep trying, there are people out there who will take you seriously and listen. Text: Iâ€™m so sorry. Iâ€™ve gone through this same thing and it sucks. I did eventually get treatment tho and am so much better for it, but the waiting game nearly killed me. If you are having suicidal thoughts please go to the emergency room. At least you will get some help there. It might help decrease the waiting time needed for referral as well.
